items.description: Breaking your scrolling habit could help you feel calmer, happier, and more energized. NPR's Life Kit explains how to get there.

items.title: Parents worried about their children's screentime: put your phone down
items.description: Parents who want their kids to cut back on screen time might want to get a handle on their own by designating specific parameters for their devices.
